title: OpenAI buys Sky, an AI interface for Mac - TechCrunch
author: Sarah Perez
description: OpenAI has acquired Software Applications, Inc., the startup behind Sky — an AI-powered natural language interface for Mac that can view your screen and take actions in your apps.

title: What happened to Apple's legendary attention to detail? - Hacker News
Microsoft makes Copilot “human-centered” with a ‘90s-style animated assistant - Ars Technica
author: Andrew Cunningham
description: “Mico” literally tries to put a face on Microsoft’s chatbot-turned-assistant.

title: Fallout: New Vegas 15th Anniversary Bundle Announced on Fallout Day — Here Are the Contents - IGN
author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Bethesda has used Fallout Day to announce the Fallout: New Vegas 15th Anniversary Bundle, which celebrates Obsidian’s much-loved post-apocalyptic role-playing game turning 15 years old. Check out the contents.

title: Anthropic expands Claude memory to all paid users - Mashable
author: Mashable
